title: Episode 3: Filling The Information Vacuum
dc:creator: Martin Austermuhle, Martin Di Caro
description: We talk to civic hackers who use WMATA's open data sources to share information about delays, accidents and more. The principal of a charter school with many non-native speakers of English talks about how language barriers can affect transit riders. And we ask: Is the latest Orange Line work boosting bike traffic in Arlington?
